name: Drunk Chicken
description:
Drunk Chicken is a single-user Unity3D game published for WebGL. The inspiration for the game came from my own family’s chicken farm, which also happens to be right across the street from a bar. After deciding that I was going to build a game from start to finish by myself, I combined these two brainstormed ideas. Thus, Drunk Chicken was born.

Try and collect all the wine bottles while avoiding an increasing number of snakes and foxes! Use the lighting bolt powerup to kill attacking enemies. Gain back lost lives by grabbing hearts. Oh.. and don't forget this chicken's movement is gonna be wobbly!

Use the arrow keys to move the chicken. Careful now! All the movement is inverted. So the up arrow key will make the chicken move downward.
